verses.verse: For the Chief Musician; set to Shoshannim, A Psalm of David. Save <S%H3467><s%> me <S%H430><s%>, O God; For the waters <S%H4325><s%> are come <S%H935><s%> in unto my soul <S%H5315><s%>.

I sink <S%H2883><s%> in deep <S%H4688><s%> mire <S%H3121><s%>, where there is no standing <S%H4613><s%>: I am come <S%H935><s%> into deep <S%H4615><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%>, where the floods <S%H7641><s%> overflow me <S%H7857><s%>.
I am weary <S%H3021><s%> with my crying <S%H7121><s%>; my throat <S%H1627><s%> is dried <S%H2787><s%>: Mine eyes <S%H5869><s%> fail <S%H3615><s%> while I wait <S%H3176><s%> for my God <S%H430><s%>.

They that hate <S%H8130><s%> me without a cause <S%H2600><s%> are more <S%H7231><s%> than the hairs <S%H8185><s%> of my head <S%H7218><s%>: They that would cut me off <S%H6789><s%>, being mine enemies <S%H341><s%> wrongfully <S%H8267><s%>, are mighty <S%H6105><s%>: That which I took not away <S%H1497><s%> I have to restore <S%H7725><s%>.
O God <S%H430><s%>, thou knowest <S%H3045><s%> my foolishness <S%H200><s%>; And my sins <S%H819><s%> are not hid from thee <S%H3582><s%>.

Let not them that wait <S%H6960><s%> for thee be put to shame <S%H954><s%> through me <S%H136><s%>, O Lord Jehovah <S%H3069><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>: Let not those that seek <S%H1245><s%> thee be brought to dishonor <S%H3637><s%> through me <S%H430><s%>, O God of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.
Because for thy sake I have borne <S%H5375><s%> reproach <S%H2781><s%>; Shame <S%H3639><s%> hath covered <S%H3680><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%>.
I am become a stranger <S%H2114><s%> unto my brethren <S%H251><s%>, And an alien <S%H5237><s%> unto my mother <S%H517><s%>'s children <S%H1121><s%>.
For the zeal <S%H7068><s%> of thy house <S%H1004><s%> hath eaten me up <S%H398><s%>; And the reproaches <S%H2781><s%> of them that reproach <S%H2778><s%> thee are fallen upon me <S%H5307><s%>.
When I wept <S%H1058><s%>, and chastened my soul <S%H5315><s%> with fasting <S%H6685><s%>, That was to my reproach <S%H2781><s%>.
When I made <S%H5414><s%> sackcloth <S%H8242><s%> my clothing <S%H3830><s%>, I became a byword unto them <S%H4912><s%>.
They that sit in <S%H3427><s%> the gate <S%H8179><s%> talk <S%H7878><s%> of me <S%H5058><s%>; And I am the song of the drunkards <S%H8354><s%>.

But as for me <S%H8605><s%>, my prayer is unto thee <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah, in an acceptable <S%H7522><s%> time <S%H6256><s%>: O God <S%H430><s%>, in the abundance <S%H7230><s%> of thy lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%>, Answer <S%H6030><s%> me in the truth <S%H571><s%> of thy salvation <S%H3468><s%>.

Deliver <S%H5337><s%> me out of the mire <S%H2916><s%>, and let me not sink <S%H2883><s%>: Let me be delivered <S%H5337><s%> from them that hate <S%H8130><s%> me <S%H4615><s%>, and out of the deep waters <S%H4325><s%>.

Let not the waterflood <S%H4325><s%> overwhelm <S%H7857><s%> me <S%H4688><s%>, Neither let the deep shallow me up <S%H1104><s%>; And let not the pit <S%H875><s%> shut <S%H332><s%> its mouth upon me <S%H6310><s%>.

Answer <S%H6030><s%> me <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah; for thy lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is good <S%H2896><s%>: According to the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of thy tender mercies <S%H7356><s%> turn thou unto me <S%H6437><s%>.
And hide <S%H5641><s%> not thy face <S%H6440><s%> from thy servant <S%H5650><s%>; For I am in distress <S%H6887><s%>; answer <S%H6030><s%> me speedily <S%H4118><s%>.
Draw nigh <S%H7126><s%> unto my soul <S%H5315><s%>, and redeem <S%H1350><s%> it <S%H6299><s%>: Ransom me because of mine enemies <S%H341><s%>.
Thou knowest <S%H3045><s%> my reproach <S%H2781><s%>, and my shame <S%H2781><s%>, and my dishonor <S%H1322><s%>: Mine adversaries are all before thee <S%H6887><s%>.

Reproach <S%H2781><s%> hath broken <S%H7665><s%> my heart <S%H3820><s%>; and I am full of heaviness <S%H5136><s%>: And I looked <S%H6960><s%> for some to take pity <S%H5110><s%>, but there was none <S%H5162><s%>; And for comforters, but I found none <S%H4672><s%>.
They gave <S%H5414><s%> me also gall <S%H7219><s%> for my food <S%H1267><s%>; And in my thirst <S%H6772><s%> they gave me vinegar <S%H2558><s%> to drink <S%H8248><s%>.
Let their table <S%H7979><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them become a snare <S%H6341><s%>; And when they are in peace <S%H7965><s%>, let it become a trap <S%H4170><s%>.
Let their eyes <S%H5869><s%> be darkened <S%H2821><s%>, so that they cannot see <S%H7200><s%>; And make their loins <S%H4975><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%> to shake <S%H4571><s%>.
Pour out <S%H8210><s%> thine indignation <S%H2195><s%> upon them <S%H2740><s%>, And let the fierceness of thine anger <S%H639><s%> overtake them <S%H5381><s%>.
Let their habitation <S%H2918><s%> be desolate <S%H8074><s%>; Let none dwell <S%H3427><s%> in their tents <S%H168><s%>.
For they persecute <S%H7291><s%> him whom thou hast smitten <S%H5221><s%>; And they tell <S%H5608><s%> of the sorrow <S%H4341><s%> of those whom thou hast wounded <S%H2491><s%>.
Add <S%H5414><s%> iniquity <S%H5771><s%> unto their iniquity <S%H5771><s%>; And let them not come <S%H935><s%> into thy righteousness <S%H6666><s%>.
Let them be blotted <S%H4229><s%> out of the book <S%H5612><s%> of life <S%H2416><s%>, And not be written <S%H3789><s%> with the righteous <S%H6662><s%>.
But I am poor <S%H6041><s%> and sorrowful <S%H3510><s%>: Let thy salvation <S%H3444><s%>, O God <S%H430><s%>, set me up on high <S%H7682><s%>.
I will praise <S%H1984><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> with a song <S%H7892><s%>, And will magnify <S%H1431><s%> him with thanksgiving <S%H8426><s%>.
And it will please <S%H3190><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> better <S%H3190><s%> than an ox <S%H7794><s%>, Or a bullock <S%H6499><s%> that hath horns <S%H7160><s%> and hoofs <S%H6536><s%>.
The meek <S%H6035><s%> have seen <S%H7200><s%> it <S%H8055><s%>, and are glad: Ye that seek <S%H1875><s%> after God <S%H430><s%>, let your heart <S%H3824><s%> live <S%H2421><s%>.
For Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> heareth <S%H8085><s%> the needy <S%H34><s%>, And despiseth <S%H959><s%> not his prisoners <S%H615><s%>.
Let heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth <S%H776><s%> praise <S%H1984><s%> him <S%H3220><s%>, The seas, and everything that moveth therein <S%H7430><s%>.

For God <S%H430><s%> will save <S%H3467><s%> Zion <S%H6726><s%>, and build <S%H1129><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>; And they shall abide there <S%H3423><s%>, and have it in possession.
The seed <S%H2233><s%> also of his servants <S%H5650><s%> shall inherit <S%H5157><s%> it <S%H157><s%>; And they that love his name <S%H8034><s%> shall dwell therein <S%H7931><s%>.
